short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It is a learning game that will teach you how to distinguish from Rembrandt.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It is a learning game that will teach you how to distinguish from Rembrandt, Rubens. Presented more than 15 schools of painting (from the Northern Renaissance, to Cubism). Large number of artists. On each answer you are given not more than 10 seconds. For each wrong answer, you lose points. Become the best and amaze your friends!
